Headline: #3 King Drive and #47 47th Temporary Reroute near King Drive/47th
ShortDescription: 3 King Dr & 47 47th buses rrtd N & S via King Dr, 48th, Calumet, 46th & King Dr; E & W via 47th, Vincennes, 46th, Prairie & 47th due to blockage nr King Dr/47th

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive & #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in all directions near due to street blockage near King Drive/47th.

  • #3 King Drive buses buses will operate Northbound and Southbound via King Drive, 48th, Calumet, 46th and King Drive.
  • #47 47th buses buses will operate Eastbound and Westbound via 47th, Vincennes, 46th, Prairie and 47th.

Allow extra travel time.
